title: Reinforcement Learning for Monopoly
description: CS senior thesis on training AI agents for Monopoly using deep Q-learning; compared multiple agent strategies.

title: Fairness in Machine Learning
description: Research paper on AI debiasing; proposed "Affirmative Equality" and published in ICAICE and China Woman's Daily.

title: What's "AI" for OpenAI Researchers?
description: Analyzed OpenAI papers using visual tools; critiqued anthropomorphic views of AI and AGI hype.

title: Election News Analysis
description: Built SVM classifier for election news using 2500+ documents; compared results with GPT-4o-mini.

title: Scales of Spatial Cognition
description: Cognitive Science thesis proposing “scales” as a unifying framework for spatial cognition research.
